title: Catch up on what you missed!

replies.body: They forgot about the most important removal in the game: {{champion:104}} "My cigar!"
so true
You forgot {{item:3742}} in the new items section!
They forgot ALL the juggernaut items.
Great Recap guys
Ty dfg.
DON'T BUY POACHER'S KNIFE.{{item:3711}} NO NO NO
Unless you're a sadistic monster {{champion:102}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:20}}
Not even as {{champion:35}} , Poacher's doesn't help you farm champions!

Ah, the good ol' days. Reminds me just how far the game has changed. Maxing CDR on Zilean with an unlimited mana Tear and having a 22 second ult cooldown and 0 second cooldown normal skills... Having insane dodge on Jax and literally soloing the enemy team while in their base dodging towers? Then later stacking Kage's Picks on Gragas with a Leviathan? Classics.

Been a long, long time!

EDIT: Surprised there's no reference of removing Dodge from the game. Were all these in the last year?
Because soloing someone in their base as full build jax is totally balanced.{{champion:24}}
Yeah, I think it's just the past year.
That would explain why {{champion:82}} updates aren't mentioned

THere's a typo, "You can upgrade this trinket to produce Vision (pink) wards, which **last three minutes**, or Sight (green) wards, **which reveal invisible units**."

You got the Ward Types mixed up!
No it is right in the recap pink wards show invisible units and green wards last 3 min
I can't believe this season began with the Shurima event. That seems like so long ago
All the complaints on the boards don't even seem like much after looking at everything that's been accomplished in a year :o
Anyone know the date of the next patch? (5.17 i think)
Next Wednesday.

> [{quoted}](name=Spicy Memer,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=bZsZ7dIu,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-08-27T21:03:11.616+0000)
>
> Next Wednesday.

How do you know, it would be useful to know for the future! :)

The PBE always is updated for 2 weeks after a patch. Patch 5.16 came out early Wed, morning and it has almost been two weeks since then. Riot generally does things in two weeks rotations to let out balance changes and skins.
Patch 5.16 came out arrived in the early hours of Thursday, August 20th, was delayed by a day.
Okay... sorry if it was delayed, generally the majority of patchs come out Wed >_>
Nah, only about half of them arrive on Thursdays. :D
Why does the warrior enchanted stalker's blade have a different shaped blade than the others?

{{item:3706}} {{item:3707}}
What's the difference? I'm clearly not seeing it...

Oh, I see it now.
I commented on the board before I read the article, so I didn't see.
And I thought I was going crazy... guess it was just a mistake.
Thank you SO MUCH Riot! I had started jungling more often, and I had no idea what the smite buffs did and was dreading the thought of going to try and find it in previous patches. Thanks again!
Just Wait {{champion:24}} DODGE is going to be removed and everyones silence is going to be removed
Nothing on Blackfire Torch, or any of the alternate map changes or VU's. I am disappoint.
{{champion:245}} Can be in the game but {{champion:104}} can`t have a cigar?

"the tragic loss of dfg" {{champion:103}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:161}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:4}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:61}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:76}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:54}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:17}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3902}}
You forgot {{champion:134}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:1}}
What happened to {{item:3053}}
The new juggernauts aren't listed as a significant kit upgrade?
He lost it in the new dawn cenimatic to nautilus lmao jk
Why was Tier 3 boots added to this, when they've been around longer then Jinx, but Jinx wasn't added to the new champions?
RIP DFG
I'm kinda surprised. No mention of any of the Juggernauts in the Changes and Kit Updates section.
Hey how about a visual update for:{{champion:83}}  Cmon you dont need to update him because of the new tank items, hes really good now, just pls give him a visual update!{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
God they forgot the gangplank update and{{champion:41}} feels saturated
{{item:3711}} if youre playing nunu LOL
What the fuck happened to akali rework.  the one where Riot fucked up a champion big time? no rework?

"You can upgrade this trinket to produce Vision (pink) wards, which last three minutes, or Sight (green) wards, which reveal invisible units." 
Wait, is that wrong?
I thought Kalista was the Spear of Vengence, not the Vengeful Spirit... Spear of Vengence sounds much cooler and more threatening.
uuuhhhnnnggg..... 3x ~{{champion:12}}

I think there's a typo in the trinket section, it says ".. You can upgrade this trinket to produce **Vision (green)** wards, which last three minutes, or **Sight (pink)** wards, which reveal invisible units..." when it should be _Sight (green)_ and _Vision (pink)_, respectively.
